response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item holds significant value to both of us, as it is worth $800,000 to you. Considering its unparalleled quality and unique features, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $750,000. This represents an attractive opportunity for you to secure this masterpiece at a reduced cost while ensuring my business gains a valuable return. I believe this is a mutually beneficial arrangement, and I look forward to your positive response. Should you have any questions or require further details, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering this special offer.", "product_price": 750000}
